summary.span: 获取或设置文件对话框的自定义空间的列表。

span.span: Gets or sets the list of custom places for file dialog boxes.

value.span: 自定义空间的列表。

span.span: The list of custom places.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从开始[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winvista](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winvista-md.md)]、 打开和保存文件对话框具有**收藏夹链接**允许用户能够快速导航到其他位置的对话框中左侧的面板。Starting in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winvista](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winvista-md.md)], open and save file dialog boxes have a **Favorite Links** panel on the left side of the dialog box that allows the user to quickly navigate to a different location. 这些链接称为自定义区域。These links are called custom places. 此属性，可修改你的应用程序使用一个文件对话框时将显示的列表。This property allows you to modify the list that appears when your application uses a file dialog box.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultExt { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定用来筛选显示的文件列表的默认扩展名字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the default extension string to use to filter the list of files that are displayed.

value.span: 默认扩展名字符串。

span.span: The default extension string.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展字符串必须包含前导句点。The extension string must contain the leading period. 例如，设置属性设置为".txt"以选择所有文本文件。For example, set the property to ".txt" to select all text files. 默认情况下，尝试确定要筛选显示的文件列表中的扩展属性属性。By default, the property attempts to determine the extension to filter the displayed file list from the property. 如果该扩展不能确定从属性，将改为使用。If the extension cannot be determined from the property, will be used instead. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建包含默认文件名称和扩展名类型。The following example shows how to create an that contains a default file name and extension type. [!code-csharp[DialogBoxesOverviewSnippets#OpenFileDialogBoxCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DialogBoxesOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#openfiledialogboxcodebehind)] [!code-vb[DialogBoxesOverviewSnippets#OpenFileDialogBoxCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DialogBoxesOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/window1.xaml.vb#openfiledialogboxcodebehind)]

summary.span: 当用户通过单击 的“打开”按钮或 的“保存”按钮选择某个文件名时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user selects a file name by either clicking the **Open** button of the or the **Save** button of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之后用户选择一个文件名，但对话框关闭之前，该编辑器可以处理所选内容，将引发。 is raised after the user selects a file name, but before the dialog closes, which allows you to process the selection. 如果需要，可以通过设置取消用户的选择属性参数`true`。If required, the user's selection can be cancelled by setting the property of the argument to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置筛选器字符串，该字符串确定在 或 中显示的文件类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the filter string that determines what types of files are displayed from either the or .

value.span: 一个包含筛选器的 。

span.span: A that contains the filter.

value.span: 默认值为 ，这意味着，不应用任何筛选器并显示所有文件类型。

span.span: The default is , which means that no filter is applied and all file types are displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`null`或，将显示所有文件，并且文件夹将始终都显示。If is either `null` or , all files are displayed, and folders are always displayed. 你可以指定要显示的设置的文件类型的子集属性。You can specify a subset of file types to be displayed by setting the property. 每个文件类型可以表示特定类型的文件，如下所示：Each file type can represent a specific type of file, such as the following: - Word 文档 (\*.doc)Word Documents (\*.doc) - Excel 工作表 (\*.xls)Excel Worksheets (\*.xls) - PowerPoint 演示文稿 (\*.ppt)PowerPoint Presentations (\*.ppt) 或者，某个文件类型可以表示一的组相关的文件类型，如下所示：Alternatively, a file type can represent a group of related file types, such as the following: - Office 文件 (\*.doc、 *.xls，*.ppt)Office Files (\*.doc, \*.xls, \*.ppt) - 所有文件 (*。\*)All Files (*.\*) 若要指定显示的文件类型的子集，你可以设置具有字符串值的属性 (*筛选器字符串*)，它指定要作为筛选依据的文件的一个或多个类型。To specify a subset of the types of files that are displayed, you set the property with a string value (the *filter string*) that specifies one or more types of files to filter by. 下面显示的筛选器字符串的预期的格式：The following shows the expected format of the filter string: `FileType1[[|FileType2]...[|FileTypeN]]` 你可以使用以下格式来描述每种文件类型：You use the following format to describe each file type: `Label|Extension1[[;Extension2]...[;ExtensionN]]` *标签*部分是一个用户可读的字符串值，描述的文件类型，如下所示：The *Label* part is a human-readable string value that describes the file type, such as the following: - "Word 文档""Word Documents" - "Excel Worksheets""Excel Worksheets" - "PowerPoint 演示文稿""PowerPoint Presentations" - "Office 文件""Office Files" - "所有文件""All Files" 必须通过至少一种描述每个文件类型*扩展*。Each file type must be described by at least one *Extension*. 如果多个*扩展*使用时，每个*扩展*必须由分号分隔 （";"）。If more than one *Extension* is used, each *Extension* must be separated by a semicolon (";"). 例如:For example: - "\*.doc""\*.doc" - "\*.xls;""\*.xls;" - "\*.ppt""\*.ppt" - "\*.doc;\*.xls;\*.ppt""\*.doc;\*.xls;\*.ppt" - "*.\*""*.\*" 以下是有效的完整示例字符串值：The following are complete examples of valid string values: - `Word Documents|*.doc` - `Excel Worksheets|*.xls` - `PowerPoint Presentations|*.ppt` - `Office Files|*.doc;*.xls;*.ppt` - `All Files|*.*` - `Word Documents|*.doc|Excel Worksheets|*.xls|PowerPoint Presentations|*.ppt|Office Files|*.doc;*.xls;*.ppt|All Files|*.*` 筛选器中包含每个文件类型添加作为一个单独项**文件类型：**下拉列表中的或下, 图中所示。Each file type that is included in the filter is added as a separate item to the **Files of type:** drop-down list in the or , as shown in the following figure. ![在打开的对话框中使用 FileDialog.Filter](~/add/media/filedialogfilterfigure1.png "在打开的对话框中使用 FileDialog.Filter")![Using the FileDialog.Filter in the Open Dialog Box](~/add/media/filedialogfilterfigure1.png "Using the FileDialog.Filter in the Open Dialog Box") 用户可以从要作为筛选依据此列表中选择文件类型。The user can choose a file type from this list to filter by. 默认情况下，选择列表 （例如，第一个文件类型） 中的第一个项时或显示。By default, the first item in the list (for example, the first file type) is selected when the or is displayed. 若要指定要选择的其他文件类型，你可以设置之前显示的属性或(通过调用)。To specify that another file type to be selected, you set the property before showing the or (by calling ). ## Examples 下面的示例演示几种类型的筛选器字符串，可以通过使用设置属性。The following examples demonstrate several types of filter strings that can be set by using the property. [!code-csharp[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#filterstring1)] [!code-vb[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#filterstring1)] [!code-csharp[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#filterstring2)] [!code-vb[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#filterstring2)] [!code-csharp[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#filterstring7)] [!code-vb[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#filterstring7)] [!code-csharp[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#filterstring8)] [!code-vb[FileDialogFilterSnippets#FilterString8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FileDialogFilterSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#filterstring8)]

summary.span: 获取或设置文件对话框中当前选定的筛选器的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the filter currently selected in a file dialog.

value.span: 一个 ，表示选定的筛选器的索引。

span.span: The that is the index of the selected filter.

value.span: 默认值为 1。

span.span: The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此索引是从 1 开始，而不基于 0 的因为与基础的兼容性要求[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]。This index is 1-based, not 0-based, due to compatibility requirements with the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值用于显示文件对话框当前组的属性值。This value is used to display a file dialog with the current set of property values. 实际的选项公开为特定的对话框上的属性，但未记录作为此级别的公共标志值，因此此属性的用途是主要内部，以便在实现的派生的类时使用和。The actual options are exposed as properties on the specific dialogs, but not documented as public flag values at this level, so the uses of this property are mainly internal, for use when implementing the derived classes and .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SafeFileName As String
public: property System::String ^ SafeFileName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，其中仅包含选定文件的文件名。

span.span: Gets a string that only contains the file name for the selected file.

value.span: 一个 ，其中仅包含选定文件的文件名。

span.span: A that only contains the file name for the selected file.

value.span: 默认值为 ，当未选定文件或选定目录时也为此值。

span.span: The default is , which is also the value when either no file is selected or a directory is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值是所有删除的路径信息。This value is the with all path information removed. 删除路径使值适用于在部分信任应用程序中使用，因为它可防止应用程序发现有关本地文件系统的信息。Removing the paths makes the value appropriate for use in partial trust applications, since it prevents applications from discovering information about the local file system. 如果选择多个文件的名称 (长度大于一) 则此属性包含仅第一个选择的文件名。If more than one file name is selected (length of is greater than one) then this property contains only the first selected file name. 请参阅[安全文件上的传 XBAP 示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01206dd3-acc7-45ff-aeb9-502c20aaad2c)。See [Safe File Upload from an XBAP Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01206dd3-acc7-45ff-aeb9-502c20aaad2c).

value.span: 一个 数组，其中包含与每个选定文件一一个对应的安全文件名。
